oai_dc:dc.dc:title: St. Louis Blues
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Performing Identity
Musicians
Songs; Popular music
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sheet music cover for St. Louis Blues.

Saint Louis Blues was published by W.C. Handy in 1914. The song is one of the most enduring blues and pop songs ever written. The sheet music cover reproduced here is from the film St Louis Blues (1958).
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Center for Popular Music, Middle Tennessee State University
